# bibliogR

[![Lifecycle: stable](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-stable-brightgreen.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#stable)

The goal of bibliogR is to facilitate the search, citation, edition, and maintenance of references in the scholRuniverse.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bibliogR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NicolasJBM/bibliogR")
```
